document_data.name: Watchful Eye (Essembra)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watchful Eye''' was an inn in [[Essembra]] around [[1368 DR]].

Structure.Interior: The inside of the Eye was a well furnished comfortable looking establishment with good rooms, as [[Volothamp Geddarm]] stated in [[Volo's Guide to the Dalelands]], "a trifle sparsely and simply decorated".

document_data.Atmosphere: The Watchful Eye of Essembria was a relaxing establishment, but was famous for it's kitchen.
document_data.Staff: The owner of the Watchful Eye was [[Chesduk Malrit]] and his three daughters, [[Aleesha Malrit]], [[Baernysse Malrit]], and [[Lathyleea Malrit]].
document_data.Services: The inn served served wonderful meat pies.
document_data.Prices: *All drinks for 6 cp per tall tankard or tall glass
